surface_layer.definition: The process of repeatedly reflecting electromagnetic waves between surfaces.

deep_layer.mechanism: Electromagnetic waves bounce back and forth between surfaces.
deep_layer.origin: A fundamental property of wave propagation.

examples: Reflection of light between two mirrors
Reflection of radio waves in a cavity
